name: General
description: A place for general discussions about the application and its features.

name: Off-Topic
description: A place for off-topic discussions of any kind that is not related to the application.

name: Support and Feedback
description: A place for support questions and answers regarding the application and the community.

name: Technical Discussions
description: A place for technical and developer-level discussions about the application and its features.

name: Interactions
description: A place for discussions about the interactions within the services and possible improvements.

name: Data Sources
description: A place for discussions about the data sources and potential collaborations.

name: Tools
description: A place for discussions about the multi-modality tools and potential improvements.

name: Stores and Developer Contributions
description: A place dedicated to the boilerplate code, plugins, and other contributions to the application.

name: Administration
description: A place for discussions about the administration of the application such as users, permissions, organization, and billing.

name: User Profile and Payment Methods
description: A place for discussions about the user profile, payment methods, and problems with the billing.

name: Data Security
description: A place for discussions about the data security methodologies embedded in the application such as NER, encryption, and data masking.
